DataElement.preferredName: Person Imaging Agent Fasting Drink Exercise Required Complete Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response to indicate whether fasting requirements for food, water and exercise were met in preparation for the use of an imaging agent.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Imaging Agent Fasting Drink Exercise Required Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging._Abstaining from food._A single serving of a beverage; any liquid suitable for drinking._Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness._Required; necessary, not optional._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging.

Concepts.definition: A compound that enables or improves the visualization of body structures or functions for medical imaging.

Property.preferredDefinition: Abstaining from food.:A single serving of a beverage; any liquid suitable for drinking.:Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.:Required; necessary, not optional.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: A single serving of a beverage; any liquid suitable for drinking.
Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: NCISTD: NCI CRF Harmonization and Standards Initiative

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

DataElement.origin: NCISTD: NCI CRF Harmonization and Standards Initiative
DataElement.changeDescription: Curated in response to community review of PET Patient Prep module of the CRF harmonization module.
